publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2567 Scott Barrie: Death of Stuart Adamson-That the Parliament notes the untimely death of Stuart Adamson; acknowledges the invaluable contribution he made to contemporary popular music in Scotland, particularly as lead singer with Big Country and guitarist with The Skids; recognises the part he played in promoting his home town of Dunfermline, and sends its condolences to his family.
S1M-2567 Death of Stuart Adamson (lodged on 19 December 2001) Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Michael Matheson*

S1M-2567 Scott Barrie: Death of Stuart Adamson-That the Parliament notes the untimely death of Stuart Adamson; acknowledges the invaluable contribution he made to contemporary popular music in Scotland, particularly as lead singer with Big Country and guitarist with The Skids; recognises the part he played in promoting his home town of Dunfermline, and sends its condolences to his family. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Michael Matheson, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2567 Death of Stuart Adamson (lodged on 19 December 2001) Shona Robison*, Tommy Sheridan*, Christine Grahame*

S1M-2567 Death of Stuart Adamson (lodged on 19 December 2001) Fiona Hyslop*

S1M-2567 Death of Stuart Adamson (lodged on 19 December 2001) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*

S1M-2567 Death of Stuart Adamson (lodged on 19 December 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2567 Death of Stuart Adamson (lodged on 19 December 2001) Pauline McNeill*
